lyrics:
For Your Love Lyrics[Verse 1]
For your love
For your love
For your love
I give you everything and more, and that's for sure
For your love
I bring you diamond rings and things right to your door
For your love

[Chorus]
To thrill you with delight, I give you diamonds bright
There'll be days that will excite
They'll make you dream of me at night

[Bridge]
For your love
For your love
For your love
[Middle Eight]
For your love, for your love
I would give the stars above
For your love, for your love
I would give you all I could

[Verse 2]
For your love
For your love
For your love
I'd give the moon if it were mine to give
For your love
I'd give the stars and the sun for I live
For your love

[Chorus]
To thrill you with delight, I give you diamonds bright
There'll be days that will excite
They'll make you dream of me at night

[Outro]
For your love
For your love
For your love
For your love
For your love1Embed
